name: Arya Deopurkar
college: K.J. College of Engineering and Management Research

education.school: K.J. College of Engineering and Management Research

projects.name: Credit Card Fraud Detection using Machine Learning
projects.description: The project aims to find potential Credit card fraud groups among a large number of financial transactions. In order to improve the efficiency of the framework, case reduction methods such as matching transaction detection and balance score filter are used to narrow down the list of potential ML accounts. Next by taking advantage of structural similarity, we can identify and group potential Credit card accounts. Our preliminary experimental results show a high degree of accuracy in detection of ML accounts.

projects.name: Amazon Clone
projects.description: Developed a functional Amazon clone website, replicating core features and functionalities, including user authentication, product listings, cart management, and secure checkout processes. Implemented responsive design principles for optimal user experience across devices.

projects.name: Login-Signup Form
projects.description: Build Login-Signup form using HTML,Bootstrap CSS and Javascript.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Build a interactive Netflix Clone Website using HTML, CSS and Node.js.

experiences.description: Proficiency in full stack web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks used React.js/Node.js. Experience with Backend development using Node.js, Java. Familiarity with databases such as MySQL, MongoDB. Understanding of LORA protocol and its implementation in IoT (Internet of Things).

Proficient in managing and maintaining network infrastructure, including routers, switches, firewalls, and other networking devices. Experience in implementing, and troubleshooting LAN/WAN solutions to ensure optimal performance and reliability, network monitoring and optimization techniques to proactively identify and resolve issues.
